EmailTemplate.description: To be sent to whom queries information regarding Dangerous Goods.
EmailTemplate.name: SCE-EN DANGEROUS GOODS GENERAL INFORMATION
EmailTemplate.subject: Dangerous Goods
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
IATA edits publications regarding the carriage of Dangerous goods and provide the corresponding trainings worldwide.
- For any question / issue regarding the transportation of hazardous materials, we invite you to contact any IATA Certified Cargo Agent (Intermediary) or your Airlines.
- To order our publications, visit our shop at www.iataonline.com
- For information regarding IATA trainings, please go to www.iata.org/training (available for self-study, in IATA classroom or Authorised Training Centre)
- To contact our Specialists Team, please send a message to dangood@iata.org. Based in Montreal, Canada, our Hotline is available at phone number +1.514 390 6770 (fax +1.514 874 2660).
In case you need further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.com/europe/cs. These queries will be answered with the highest priority.
Yours Sincerely
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
